title: What do people mean in League of Legends?
body:
I have been having some trouble with the chat in some games because i don't understand the meaning of most of the things they say
eg. Gank=?
so things like that. please help me!!!!!!

replies.body:
Gank = When a jungler or laner goes into a lane attempting to kill the enemy.
Pressure Gank = When a jungler or laner goes into a lane to zone the enemy allowing their teammate to safely take farm or ensure that their teammate isn't killed by a level 6 pop all in (pretty much only seen in mid lane).
Roam = When a laner leaves lane to gank or help take an objective elsewhere.
Peel = Staying close to a carry to help kill anyone who tries to focus them down. 
Kite(as a team) = Instead of fully committing to a fight your team focuses on peeling away from the enemy team.
Kite(in general) = You aa/use a skill then move repeatedly to keep distance between you and your enemy while getting damage out.
Zoning = Forcing the enemy into a situation where if they push up close enough for farm they'll take lots of harass.
Stacking = Killing around 5 minions in your lane then leaving to let your wave of minions slowly become bigger over time forcing the enemy to either go clear them or let them take the tower (good for forcing Teleport uses and 4v5 fights).
Freezing = Last hitting minions only so that the wave doesn't push making it easier to zone.
Siege =  When a team groups as five and focuses on taking a tower by poking the enemy team off it (forces them to base making it safer).

All I could think of so far hope it helps pal.

Might have heard peel?
Peel is where you take all the damage and CC to keep your carry alive.

Gank means the Jungler has to come attack and help that lane and if possible kill the person.
Mia means the person is missing.

And I'll leave the rest to a pro.
